channel.title: Is it actually possible to
channel.description:
(NOTE, BEFORE YOU READ, READ THIS): I am not actually a hacker, autoer, I am posting this because someone hacked or messed up my server.
Anyway, onto the post...
Is it actually possible to become an admin/mod/co-owner, if you are not the owner of the server and do not have the source files? Because thats what happened to me today. If anyone knows any way of stopping people doing this, can you tell me, because it would be greatly appreciated.
Thank you for taking the time to read.

item.title: Is it actually possible to
item.dc:creator: @Pancakes Pancakes
item.description:
@Pancakes wrote:

i have a good way of stopping this. if there making an account named “admin” and become admin, delete the admin file and make an account named admin with a pass, so noone can make it before you. you should also check your client for other names the source creator might have used. you can search through your client.java by using Ctrl+F. hope i helped.

-Pancakes

Read full topic

item.title: Is it actually possible to
item.dc:creator: @toastface5 toastface5
item.description:
@toastface5 wrote:

[quote=“F00L I K0, post:4, topic:112330”]Try deleting all the player files first…[/quote] I did do that, all there was was my 2 accounts on my server, and the hacker wasn’t logging into either of those accounts.

Read full topic

item.title: Is it actually possible to
item.dc:creator: @fatcat2248 fatcat2248
item.description:
@fatcat2248 wrote:

Yes i think it is possible for someone to be becoma a admin without you knowing
This happened to mine, a person called admin logged onto my server and according to my server he was the owner i suggest doing what domo says and try and make it hack proof cause there is a greater chance that this wont happen again

Read full topic

item.title: Is it actually possible to
item.dc:creator: @domo9122 domo9122
item.description:
@domo9122 wrote:

That happened to my mates server. All i can suggest is to try make it hack proof. Which there is a tutorial in the “Rs2 Tutorials” section.

Read full topic
